name: humidificationAmount_setValue
description: This function is used to set the humidification amount of a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the humidification amount.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: The desired humidification amount expressed as a percentage.
